title: Manchester United v. Southampton | PREMIER LEAGUE HIGHLIGHTS | 2/2/2021 | NBC Sports
author: NBC Sports
description:
Southampton played 88 minutes with 10 men and four minutes with nine, and Manchester United made them pay in a record-tying 9-0 thumping at Old Trafford. #NBCSports #PremierLeague #ManchesterUnited #Southampton
